title: Values in `examples` must validate against the schema
description: Each entry in an `examples` array should be a valid instance of the schema it annotates; misleading examples hinder tooling and docs.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Example contradicts type
comprehensiveExamples.description: All examples must be valid instances of the schema.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Example violates format
comprehensiveExamples.description: When using format, ensure examples conform to it.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Multiple valid examples
comprehensiveExamples.description: Providing several valid examples is acceptable and useful.

message: Remove or fix invalid example values.
